mapper.sql: SELECT item.id AS item_id1, item.name AS item_name1, item2.id AS item_id2, item2.name AS item_name2, gp.id AS group_id1, gp.name AS group_name1, gp2.id AS group_id2, gp2.name AS group_name2, g.id AS product_id FROM base_data_product_saleprop_item_relation AS r INNER JOIN base_data_product AS g ON g.id = r.product_id INNER JOIN base_data_product_saleprop_item AS item ON item.id = r.sale_prop_item_id1 LEFT JOIN base_data_product_saleprop_item AS item2 ON item2.id = r.sale_prop_item_id2 INNER JOIN base_data_product_saleprop_group AS gp ON gp.id = r.sale_prop_group_id1 LEFT JOIN base_data_product_saleprop_group AS gp2 ON gp2.id = r.sale_prop_group_id2
